text: Pteromeris is a genus of molluscs in the family Carditidae.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 45. The related genus Coripia is sometimes included here. ==Species== * Pteromeris perplana (Conrad, 1841) – flat cardita ==References== Category:Carditidae Category:Bivalve genera
title: Pteromeris
